page.title: 10PLAYGROUND GAMES 2 DOUNE
page.content: {BRITISH BULLDOGS 1. You pick someone to go in the centre. They call someone to run across. They try to catch the person who is running across. 2. If that person is caught he stands with the person already in the centre. Then they call out another name and both of them try to catch him. 3. If nobody is caught everyone runs across.This continues until there is one person left. ALISTAIR {DONKEY "We form a circle with someone in the centre.The person in the middle throws a ball to someone in the circle. If they drop the ball the letter D of donkey is gone. Nothing happens if it is caught. You carry on until the word is finished.The person who last dropped the ball is donkey." LAURA
